flavorText: As soon as Jace laid eyes on the great sphinx's chamber, the shards of memory began sliding into place.

foreignData.flavorText: Sowie Jace einen ersten Blick auf die Kammer der Sphinx geworfen hatte, begannen die bruchstückhaften Erinnerung wieder ein Gesamtbild zu ergeben.
foreignData.name: Azors Pforte // Heiligtum der Sonne
foreignData.text:
(Transformierte Azors Pforte.)
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um X Mana genau einer beliebigen Farbe, wobei X gleich deinem Lebenspunktestand ist.

foreignData.flavorText: En cuanto Jace posó la mirada en la cámara de la gran esfinge, los recuerdos fragmentados empezaron a encajar.
foreignData.name: Portal de Azor // Santuario del sol
foreignData.text:
(Se transforma del Portal de Azor.)
{T}: Agrega X manás de un color cualquiera a tu reserva de maná, donde X es tu total de vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Dès que Jace posa le regard sur la salle du grand sphinx, les fragments de sa mémoire commencèrent à reprendre leur place.
foreignData.name: Portail d'Azor // Sanctuaire du Soleil
foreignData.text:
(Transformation du Portail d'Azor.)
{T} : Ajoutez X manas de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve, X étant votre total de points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Non appena Jace posò lo sguardo sulla sala della grande sfinge, i frammenti di memoria cominciarono a ricomporsi.
foreignData.name: Portale di Azor // Santuario del Sole
foreignData.text:
(Si trasforma dal Portale di Azor.)
{T}: Aggiungi X mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana, dove X è pari ai tuoi punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: ジェイスが偉大なスフィンクスの部屋に目を向けると、記憶の断片が適切な場所に納まり始めた。
foreignData.name: アゾールの門口 // 太陽の聖域
foreignData.text:
（アゾールの門口から変身する。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナＸ点を加える。Ｘはあなたのライフ総量に等しい。

foreignData.flavorText: 제이스가 거대한 스핑크스의 방에 눈을 돌리자, 기억의 파편이 제자리를 찾아 가기 시작했다.
foreignData.name: 아조르의 관문 // 태양의 은신처
foreignData.text:
(아조르의 관문에서 변신함.)
{T}: 원하는 한 가지 색 마나 X개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다. X는 당신의 생명 총점이다.

foreignData.flavorText: Tão logo Jace pôs os olhos na câmara da grande esfinge, os fragmentos de memória começaram a se encaixar.
foreignData.name: Portal de Azor // Sacrário do Sol
foreignData.text:
(Transformação de Portal de Azor.)
{T}: Adicione X manas de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana, sendo X o seu total de pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Как только Джейс увидел покои великого сфинкса, осколки его памяти начали медленно занимать свои прежние места.
foreignData.name: Врата Азора // СВЯТИЛИЩЕ СОЛНЦА
foreignData.text:
(Трансформируется из Врат Азора.)
{T}: добавьте Х маны одного любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны, где Х — ваше количество жизней.

foreignData.flavorText: 杰斯刚一看到大史芬斯内室景象，脑海中的记忆碎片便开始归位。
foreignData.name: 俄佐闸门 // 圣阳圣所
foreignData.text:
（由俄佐闸门转化。）
{T}：加X点任意颜色的单色法术力到你的法术力池中，X为你的总生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 傑斯剛一看到大史芬斯內室景象，腦海中的記憶碎片便開始歸位。
foreignData.name: 俄佐閘門 // 聖陽聖所
foreignData.text:
（由俄佐閘門轉化。）
{T}：加X點任意顏色的單色魔法力到你的魔法力池中，X為你的總生命。

name: Azor's Gateway // Sanctum of the Sun
originalText:
(Transforms from Azor's Gateway.)
{T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is your life total.

rulings.text: If a card in exile has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
The cards you exile from your hand are exiled face up.
The mana value of a split card, such as a card with aftermath from the Amonkhet block, is based on the combined mana cost of its two halves. A split card doesn’t have two mana values.
If an object has no mana cost, its mana value is 0. A mana value of 0 can still help unlock Azor’s Gateway.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).
The ability of Sanctum of the Sun is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

text:
(Transforms from Azor's Gateway.)
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is your life total.
